Text.text: The context of the field contained in the table is related to the entity set 'childWithoutSE'. This entity set doesn't get any global SideEffects and is not configured as draftRoot. When the user presses Enter in this field, SAP Fiori elements retrieves the ancestor entity set configured as draftRoot. If this ancestor is annotated with messages, the prepareAction is triggered and the messages are requested from the back end. The back-end messages are added into the message view.
